title: An Act creating a special legislative commission to study barriers to job retention for low-income workers

abstracts.abstract: By Representative LeBoeuf of Worcester, a petition (accompanied by bill, House, No. 2140) of David Henry Argosky LeBoeuf for an investigation by a special commission (including members of the General Court) relative to barriers to job retention for low-income workers.  Labor and Workforce Development.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on Labor and Workforce Development

related_entities.name: committee on Labor and Workforce Development

actions.description: Hearing scheduled for 06/10/2025 from 11:00 AM-01:00 PM in B-1
Reporting date extended to Wednesday, December 3, 2025
Bill reported favorably by committee and referred to the committee on Rules of the two branches, acting concurrently

related_entities.name: the committee on Rules of the two branches, acting concurrently
committee on Rules of the two branches, acting concurrently

actions.description: Discharged to the committee on House Rules
